adaa.analytics.rules.operator.gui

Class RulePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • adaa.analytics.rules.operator.gui.RulePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class RulePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class is an element of RapidMiner plugin user interface. It represents a subpanel of ExpertPanel for defining user's knowledge.
    See Also:
